rooms.name: Mountain footpath
rooms.description:
You are on a path that hopefully leads to the Iron Mountain peak. 
The terrain has a strange shade of yellow and it's covered of blue stones. 
To the north, you see a big black forest. 
To the south, your warm house. 
To the east, there is the road for the port.

items.name: terrain
items.description: The terrain has a strange yellow shade... this place must have known magic.

items.name: blue stones
items.description: These strange blue stones... I don't know what they mean but they're kind of warm.

NPCs.name: wizard
NPCs.description: This is clearly a wizard... maybe he can help you.

dialogue.message: Don't go to the port road... strange things happen there.

rooms.name: Black forest
rooms.description:
You suddenly feel that the temperature is dropping quickly. 
You entered a big forest: everything is dark and cold, you can barely see your feet.
All around you, there are only trees and it seems like there is a small clearing to the west.

items.name: trees
items.description: These trees have something that freezes me up...

rooms.name: Your house
rooms.description:
Oh, this is your happy place. You live here with your wife and your 3 children, but you remember all this. 
The house faces the north road: it leads to a mountain footpath.

rooms.name: Port road
rooms.description:
You are walking down the main road that leads to the port. You have always been a little frightened by this road, you never really loved the sea. 
But this time, you see something that catches your attention: a knife in the middle of the road.

items.name: knife
items.description: This is a sharp knife... it's still covered with blood.
